ygData.subject: Re: To the programmer in charge of trade skills
ygData.msgSnippet: Sounds good to me.  *signs his name on the petition* ... gr0k - Stranger in a Strange Land - http://www.juju.org Linux... find out what you ve been missing
ygData.messageBody:
Sounds good to me. *signs his name on the petition*

---
gr0k - Stranger in a Strange Land - http://www.juju.org
"Linux... find out what you've been missing while
you've been rebooting Windows NT" - Infoworld


> From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
> a few simple questions.
>
> 1) Is there a third tinkering book on the normal servers?
> 2) Are there recipes available that are not in the 2 books by the
windmill?
> 3) Are you planning on enhancing this skill in the near future? The
Distant
> future?
>
> Thank you for taking the time to answer these questions for us. We are a
group
> of dedicated tinkerers who have been chasing our tails for several months
now,
> and we are all getting pretty frustrated. Several of us have had numerous
> conversations with different GM's. Some have said the skill was broken,
others
> have said that it works perfectly. If you could shed some light on this
> subject we would all greatly appreciate it.
>
> Thank You Again
>
> M. Stokes
> AKA
> Malkin Fennin Ro
